llm.feedback: The draft correctly identifies the key drivers but lacks explicit causal links and precise catalyst windows; replace the generic “CPI >2.5% + Fed cuts” line with a single, time‑specific trigger such as “2025‑08‑15 us_inflation >2.5% → Fed cut → DXY +1.0‑1.5% (XTQIQRP5K)”; similarly, tighten the Mizuho/MUFG M&A entry to “2025‑10‑01 deal announcement → Q2‑26 completion → DXY +0.5‑1.0% (PA57YBYVQ)”; for the downside, collapse the ECB cut and tariff rollback into one “2025‑09‑11 ECB 25bp cut or tariff rollback → DXY –0.5‑1.0% (XTQIQRP5K)”; drop the generic “Tariff rollback” line. Ensure each line cites a single ID, uses a concise causal chain, and includes a probability grounded in the source (e.g., 70% for CPI, 55% for M&A, 60% for ECB cut, 50% for tariff rollback). Remove any redundant or vague wording, and keep the format strictly “Up/Down | Time window | Driver/Mechanism | What to watch | Probability %”.
